data.name: frmMain_About
data.value: Game Backup Monitor[BR]Version: [PARAM] ([PARAM])[BR]Build: [PARAM][BR][PARAM][BR][BR]This program comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY.[BR]This is free software, and you are welcome to redistribute it under certain conditions.[BR][BR]See gpl-3.0.html in the program folder for details.

data.name: frmMain_ManifestRemovedEntry
data.value: [PARAM] entry was removed from local manfiest.

data.name: frmMain_ManifestTotalRemoved
data.value: [PARAM] entries were removed from the local manifest.

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmManifestClean
data.value: This tool removes orphaned backup information from the local manifest based on the current backup folder. Data can become orphaned when backups are deleted by various computers that share the same backup folder on a cloud or network.[BR][BR]When alternating between different backup folders you should NOT use this tool.[BR][BR]Do you wish to proceed?

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmRebuild
data.value: This will rebuild all databases and shrink them to an optimal size.[BR]This should only be used if your gbm.s3db files are becoming very large.[BR][BR]Do you wish to continue?

data.name: frmMain_Exit
data.value: Are you sure you want to exit? Your games will no longer be monitored.

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmBackup
data.value: Do you wish to backup data from [PARAM]?

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmMonitorCancel
data.value: Do you wish to cancel the monitoring of [PARAM]?[BR][BR]Warning: When monitoring is cancelled, session time is NOT saved.

data.name: frmMain_ConfirmRunAsAdmin
data.value: Do you want to restart Game Backup Monitor as Administrator?

data.name: frmMain_Error64Backup
data.value: [PARAM] is a 64-bit game, GBM cannot detect the required information to save your backup.

data.name: frmMain_Error7zip
data.value: 7-Zip was not found. The application cannot continue.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAdminBackup
data.value: [PARAM] was running as Administrator and GBM is not, GBM cannot detect the required information to save your backup.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAdminDetect
data.value: [PARAM] is running as Administrator and GBM is not.[BR]You cannot cancel monitoring at this time.[BR][BR]Run GBM as Administrator to prevent this issue.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAlreadyAdmin
data.value: Game Backup Monitor is already running as Administrator.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorAppLocationChanged
data.value: GBM is running from a new location, the Windows startup entry has been updated.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorBackupSessionLength
data.value: [PARAM] backup was cancelled due to session length.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorBackupUnknownPath
data.value: [PARAM] backup was cancelled due to unknown path.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorCustomVariable
data.value: The following monitored game(s) contain a custom path variable that is not set.[BR][PARAM][BR][BR]You will encounter backup/restore errors with these games until the variables are set.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorDBVerLocal
data.value: Your local GBM data (Version [PARAM]) is too new for your version of GBM (Version [PARAM]).[BR][BR]Please upgrade GBM or restore the database file appropriate for your version. The application cannot proceed.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorDBVerRemote
data.value: The GBM data (Version [PARAM]) in your backup folder is too new for your version of GBM (Version [PARAM])[BR][BR]All computers sharing a backup folder must use the same version of GBM. The application cannot proceed.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorMulti64
data.value: Install the 64-bit version of GBM to detect the last running game.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorMultiAdmin
data.value: Restart GBM as Administrator to detect the last running game.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorRelativePath
data.value: [PARAM] uses a relative path and has never been detected on this computer.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorRestorePath
data.value: [PARAM] restore was cancelled due to a restore path issue.

data.name: frmMain_ErrorSettingsFolder
data.value: An error occured creating application settings folder. The application cannot proceed.[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: frmMain_ManualBackup
data.value: A manaul backup of [PARAM] was triggered.

data.name: frmMain_MasterListChanged
data.value: The master game list has been changed by a program other than GBM.

data.name: frmMain_RunningAsAdmin
data.value: GBM is running with Administrator privileges.

data.name: frmMain_RunningAsNormal
data.value: GBM is running with normal privileges. Click to restart as Administrator.

data.name: frmMain_gMonStripStatusButtonToolTip
data.value: Click to toggle monitoring on or off.

data.name: App_ConfirmDirty
data.value: There are unsaved changes on this form. Do you want to save?

data.value: Choose a valid xml file to import

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmBackup
data.value: Are you sure you want to run a backup for [PARAM]? This will close the form.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmBackupDelete
data.value: This will delete the selected backup file. This cannot be undone. [BR][BR]Do you want to delete [PARAM]?

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmGameDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete [PARAM]? This cannot be undone.[BR][BR]This will not delete any backup files that already exist for this game.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmMark
data.value: Do you want to mark [PARAM] as restored? This cannot be undone.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmMultiBackup
data.value: Are you sure you want to run a backup for [PARAM] games? This will close the form.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmMultiGameDelete
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the [PARAM] selected games? This cannot be undone.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmMultiMark
data.value: Do you want to mark [PARAM] games as restored? This cannot be undone.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmMultiRestore
data.value: Are you sure you want to restore the backups for [PARAM] games? This will close the form.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmMultiSave
data.value: Are you sure you want to save the following changes to [PARAM] selected games?[BR][BR]Monitor this game: [PARAM][BR]Monitor only: [PARAM]

data.value: Would you like to choose games to import from the official list?[BR][BR]This requires an active internet connection.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmRestore
data.value: Are you sure you want to restore the backup for [PARAM]? This will close the form.

data.name: frmGameManager_ConfirmRestoreAnyway
data.value: [PARAM] is already up to date.[BR][BR]Would you like to restore this backup anyway?

data.name: frmGameManager_ErrorGameDupe
data.value: A game with this exact name and process already exists.

data.name: frmGameManager_ErrorNoBackupData
data.value: The selected game(s) have no backup data or can't be restored with their current configuration.

data.value: The backup file does not exist.

data.value: You must choose items to include in the backup, or choose to save the entire folder.

data.value: The restore path does not exist.

data.name: frmGameManager_ErrorPathNotSet
data.value: [PARAM] uses a relative path and the game path has not been set.

data.value: You must enter a valid game name.

data.value: You must enter a valid process name.

data.value: Choose exe file that starts the game

data.value: [PARAM] has been saved.[BR][BR]Would you like to add tags for [PARAM]?

data.value: The path to the executable must be a full path.

data.value: The selected path must be a full path.

data.name: frmAddWizard_ErrorGameDupe
data.value: A game with this exact name and process already exists.

data.value: The file you selected is not an executable file.

data.value: This file is not a shorcut.

data.value: The selected executable file does not exist.

data.name: frmAddWizard_ErrorSavePathNotExist
data.value: The folder you selected does not exist or is not a valid folder.

data.name: frmAddWizard_ErrorValidName
data.value: You must enter a valid game name.

data.name: frmAddWizard_ErrorValidProcess
data.value: You must select the game's executable file (.exe) to continue.

data.name: frmAddWizard_ErrorValidSavePath
data.value: You must select the game's save file path to continue

data.name: frmAddWizard_ErrorValidSaveType
data.value: You must choose items to include in the backup, or choose to save the entire folder.

data.name: frmAddWizard_ErrorWithShortcut
data.value: An error occured working with the shortcut file.[BR][BR][PARAM]

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep1Instructions
data.value: The name will be automatically filtered for length and invalid characters. You may drag and drop a shortcut here to complete this step, only Windows shortcuts are currently supported.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep1Intro
data.value: Enter the name of the game to monitor:

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep2Instructions
data.value: Some games use launchers. Do not monitor launchers, be sure to choose the game's actual exe file. You may drag and drop a shortcut here to complete this step, only Windows shortcuts are currently supported.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep2Intro
data.value: Choose the game's executable file or shortcut:

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep3aInstructions
data.value: Choose any file types, specific files or folders you wish to include in the backup. If you're unsure, go back a step and choose to save the entire folder.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep3Instructions
data.value: If you're unsure of exactly which files to backup, make sure Save entire folder is checked. You can also choose to save multiple backups and set a limit on how many to keep.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep3Intro
data.value: Choose the location of your game's save files:

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep4Instructions
data.value: Choose any file types, specific files or folders you wish to exclude from the backup. You may choose multiple items to exclude. This step can be skipped.

data.name: frmAddWizard_lblStep5Intro
data.value: Verify your settings below and click Finish to save.

data.name: frmChooseGame_lblChoose
data.value: Please choose the game you were playing:

data.name: frmFileFolderSearch_SwitchDrives
data.value: Do you wish to search the [PARAM] drive?

data.name: frmIncludeExclude_BrowseSaveFolder
data.value: Choose the location of the saved game folder:

data.value: Click here to set the saved game folder.

data.name: frmIncludeExclude_ToolTipFiles
data.value: Set the saved game folder using the button above.

data.value: The saved game folder could not be determined or does not exist.

data.value: Create a sub-folder for each game

data.value: Notify when there are new backup files to restore

data.name: frmSettings_chkSupressBackup
data.value: Backup only when session time exceeds

data.value: The backup folder does not exist. Please choose a valid backup folder.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_chkCreateFolder
data.value: Create a sub-folder for each game

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_chkSync
data.value: Import any existing GBM data in the backup folder

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ConfirmOfficialImport
data.value: Would you like to choose games to import from the official list?[BR][BR]This requires an active internet connection.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ErrorBadFolder
data.value: The selected path must be a full path.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ErrorNoFolder
data.value: You must select a backup path to continue.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ErrorNoFolderExists
data.value: The folder you selected does not exist or is not a valid folder.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_ExistingData
data.value: Existing data was detected in the backup folder and has been imported.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep1Instructions
data.value: This guide will help you through some quick and easy steps to get started.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep1Instructions2
data.value: If you'd like to learn about advanced features or have any other questions before you get started, there is a detailed online manual available.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep2Instructions
data.value: GBM will store all your backup files along with a manifest database (gbm.s3db) in this location.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep2Intro
data.value: Choose where GBM saves your backup files:

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep3Intro
data.value: Before you can start monitoring for games, they need to be configured so GBM knows what to look for and how to handle them. You can download pre-made configurations from the official list or add them all yourself using the tools below. You can also skip this step for now!

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep4Instructions
data.value: GBM will automatically monitor and backup your games each time they are closed.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep4Instructions2
data.value: Remember that GBM can only currently monitor one game at a time.

data.name: frmStartUpWizard_lblStep4Instructions3
data.value: You can change anything you've setup in this wizard and find more settings and features by exploring the menus. Thanks!

data.value: Are you sure you want to delete [PARAM]? This cannot be undone.[BR][BR]All games using this tag will have it removed.

data.value: The sync settings have changed and data already exists in the backup folder.[BR][BR]Do you want to make your current game data on this PC the new master game data in this folder? (Highly Recommended)[BR][BR]Choosing No will sync your game data on this PC to the current master game data in this folder.

data.value: The restore path for [PARAM] does not match it's current save path.[BR][BR]Do you want to restore to the current save path instead? (Recommended)
